page.title: 12AT HOME
page.content: I don't mind living in a tower block. I can see as far as Dagenham one way and as far as the Thames the other way. I share my bedroom with my brother. We have bunk beds. On our walls there are posters of 'Wham' and 'Madness' who are our favourite pop groups. In the front room we can watch the television or a film on the video. Last Christmas my mother bought us some computer games to play. At night time is the only time I don't like living here. It's noisy from next door, and you can hear them shouting or playing loud music through the walls. When someone has a party upstairs you can hear thumping and singing all night. In the day it's okay.
